Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Round

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Round
public class Round extends Object
This class implements the game object Round Each round is made by as many turns as the number of players in the game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Round()
    the round state is set to planning state the rest is a default constructor
